entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
